basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: .NET Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer with 3+ years of professional experience in full-stack development, including .NET technologies, C#, and OOP principles. Proven track record in maintaining web applications, working with legacy code, debugging technical issues, and implementing automated testing. Experience with SQL databases, version control (Git), and Agile methodologies.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Maintained and developed software applications with focus on code quality, debugging, and refactoring.
highlights: Maintained web applications and worked with legacy codebases
Investigated and resolved technical issues through systematic debugging
Performed code reviews and mentored junior developers
Implemented automated testing and ensured code quality standards
Applied OOP principles and design patterns in production code
Worked in Agile environment with cross-functional teams
